'''Atēpu''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The sun-scarred Huana glances up from the rumpled sheet of parchment in his hands and regards you with unease.}}
Atēpu is a [Huana](/huana/) navigator and cartographer that discovered the island of [Motare o Kōzi](/motareOKozi/), one of the lost sanctuary isles in the [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/).

He can be found by the statue of [Hylea](/hylea/) to the west of the throne room inside [Kahanga Palace](/kahangaPalace/), in the [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/) district of [Neketaka](/neketaka/).

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Last Sanctuary](/theLastSanctuary/)
|none            = 
|other           = * You can only talk to him after starting The Last Sanctuary, or after visiting Motare o Kōzi.
* Talk to him for more information about Motare o Kōzi, the sanctuary isles and [Ukaizo](/ukaizo/).
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Last Sanctuary](/theLastSanctuary/): [Prince Aruihi](/princeAruihi/) mentions that Atēpu discovered [Motare o Kōzi](/motareOKozi/), the destination of the quest.
[Category:Serpent's Crown characters](/categorySerpentsCrownCharacters/)
[Category:Kahanga Palace characters](/categoryKahangaPalaceCharacters/)

Atēpu is a [[Huana]] navigator and cartographer that discovered the island of [[Motare o Kōzi]], one of the lost sanctuary isles in the [[Deadfire Archipelago]].

He can be found by the statue of [[Hylea]] to the west of the throne room inside [[Kahanga Palace]], in the [[Serpent's Crown]] district of [[Neketaka]].
